DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate effect two hand antiseptic product hand skin condition healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Two-week Crossover Evaluation Two Hand Antiseptic Products Skin Condition Healthy Human Subjects
DOC.criteria: Female age 25 55 Subject agrees use hand wash product hand provided study . Subject agree use moisturizers skin product hand study Subject agrees use glove protect hand activity dish wash Subject willing sign Informed Consent HIPAA Subject agree comply study requirement Subject history psoriasis , active dermatitis , skin reaction , crack , irritated , broken skin , skin infection hand Subject scaly skin hand base Visual Scoring Scale Day 1 Subject sensitivity history skin reaction study material ( eg , alcohol , chlorhexidine gluconate zinc pyrithone latex glove ) Subject use moisturizing product product arm hand within 5 day prior participation study Subject pregnant Study coordinator believe subject unsuitable inclusion study
